TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit COMFieldInfo extends System.Reflection.FieldInfo implements class Microsoft.JScript.MemberInfoInitializer

Docs.summary: Enables JScript to communicate with an external COM field. This class is used by an external COM implementation to expose its objects to JScript because JScript needs a managed <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> in order to bind to an external object.

Gets the attributes that are associated with this field.
Gets the type that declares this field.
Docs.value: null, because the type that declares this field is an external COM object.

Docs.summary: Throws an exception in all cases.
Docs.value: Throws an exception in all cases.

Docs.summary: Gets the type of this field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo GetCOMMemberInfo() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a managed object that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM field.
Docs.returns: A managed object that enables JScript to communicate with this external COM field.

The new value of the external COM member.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control the binding.
An object that converts the type from actual argument type to formal argument type.
Provides information about a specific culture or locale. Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
